title: How to Catch a Rare Dragon in Dragcave

steps.headline: Search all of the biomes.
steps.description: Learn the description of the egg and search for that one description.

steps.headline: Select one biome.
steps.description: Repeatedly refresh until a rare drops, then click it as fast as you can. Alternatively, click on each biome in order; this offers better coverage but you're more likely to not notice a rare until it's too late if you aren't seeing the descriptions change as you would if you commit to one biome.

steps.headline: For more help, set up a search party.
steps.description: You are most likely to find the egg this way with more people searching. Get some friends who are willing to help you find the egg. Have each one assigned to a biome, constantly refreshing the page. When a friend finds it, offer them a trade, just to be nice. (They did after all just help you find a rare egg.)

steps.headline: Find someone who takes IOU's in exchange for breeding requests on the forums.
steps.description: Ask them to breed you the egg you are looking for in exchange for X or another good egg in exchange for X.

steps.headline: Take a look at your dragons.
steps.description: Do you have a CB semi-common, a pretty dragon line, or a nice name? Can you raise eggs to the hatchling stage? If you can, use it to breed for a trade.

steps.headline: Using the dragon you have received in exchange for X, breed to get better and better dragons.
steps.description: Eventually you will be able to get the rare dragon you want.
